[[Laureano Ibarra]] |formercoach= |choreographer= Dalilah Sappenfield |formerchoreographer= |skating club= Detroit SC, Inc. |former skating club = |beganskating = |retired= |worldranking= '''TBD''' (''{{As of|2011|9|17}}'') |pbrankings = '''TBD''' (''[[2011â2012 figure skating season|2011â2012]]'') |combined total= 141.42 |combined date= [[2011â12 ISU Junior Grand Prix|JGP Poland]] |SP score= 48.89 |SP date= JGP Poland |FS score= 92.53 |FS date= JGP Poland }} '''Matthew Blackmer''' (born December 12, 1991 in [[Findlay, Ohio]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[Pair skating|pair skater]]. With partner [[Britney Simpson]], he is the [[2011â12 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2011 JGP Poland champion]]. He teamed up with Simpson in February 2011 after his previous partner quit. Blackmer is a graduate of [[Lake Orion High School]] in [[Lake Orion, Michigan]].http://web.icenetwork.com/skaters/detail.jsp?id=39961&mode=P == Programs == (with Simpson) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
